mapper.select: SELECT t.*, t2.user_name, t3.flow_id, t4.dict_name type_name FROM t_vacation_order t LEFT JOIN sys_user t2 ON t.user_id = t2.user_id LEFT JOIN tf_flow_main t3 ON t3.vacation_id = t.vacation_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict t4 ON t4.dict_value = t.vacation_type WHERE t2.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
